ModMetaData.name: ESCP - Minotaur Race
ModMetaData.author: Morgante, Rick, SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in the Minotaurs using Humanoid Alien Race Framework. Minotaurs are a mix of human and bull qualities. They are much stronger and more capable crafters. They have an decreased social impact, researching speed and tending speed. They have a increased base health and combat capability with their horns being weapon like already.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded
-Requires Harmony
-Requires Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
